introScreen.name: Connect
introScreen.description: Connect is a game about how people form first impressions online.

howItWorksScreen.title: Here's how it works...
howItWorksScreen.description1: Connect is a live simulation game. People are participating
howItWorksScreen.description3: at multiple sites throughout Rhode Island.
howItWorksScreen.smDescription: Connect will search your social media networks to see if anyone you know is participating right now.
howItWorksScreen.impressionsDescription: On Connect, you will give your first impressions of other people and they will give their first impressions of you.

howItLooksScreen.title: Here's how it works.
howItLooksScreen.description1: Connect users participating right now will be randomly paired with each other.
howItLooksScreen.description2: There will be multiple rounds of the game.
howItLooksScreen.description3: In each round, users will be providing their first impressions of the people they are paired with.

getStartedScreen.title: Let's get started!
getStartedScreen.description1: You will be paired with the Connect users you selected.
getStartedScreen.description2: Please give your first impressions by rating how much you think you'd like to be friends with each person.

pickSM.textTop: Please check any social media sites you use. Connect will search your contacts to see if anyone you know is participating...
pickSM.textBottom: Remember: Connect is totally private. We will never access your personal information, post anything on your account, or notify your contacts.

friendsSM.text1: There are a total of 53 users on Connect.
friendsSM.text2: You have 3 friends on Connect right now!
friendsSM.text3: You have 15 friends-of-friends on Connect right now!

photoUpload.title: Time to create your profile!
photoUpload.text1: Please upload a photo of yourself.
photoUpload.text2: Other people participating in Connect will see your photo.
photoUpload.prompt: How much do you like this photo? (Other people won't see your answer)

bio.title: Time to create your profile!
bio.text1: Please answer a few questions to complete your bio.
bio.text2: Other people participating in Connect will see your bio.
bio.prompt: How much does this bio represent who you are?
bio.activity: What do you like to do in your free time?

ratingQuestion.text: How much would you like to be friends with this person?

interpQuestion.text: How much does this person want to be friends with you?
